overview: Mr. Brian K. Estabrook joined CardioFocus in 2004 as Director of Research and Development. He then assumed the operations groupâ€™s leadership role in early 2007. Mr. Estabrook served as Vice President of Research and Development with Biolink, Inc. with research efforts focused on innovative dialysis access and infection control products. During his tenure as Manager of Mechanical & Ultrasonic Engineering for Ultracision, Inc., the engineering team developed the Harmonicâ„¢ Scalpel product line. Ultracision was then acquired by Ethicon Endo-Surgery. Mr. Estabrook also invested 8 years of his early career with General Electric in their Armament Systems Division in Burlington Vermont where he served as Project Engineer and team leader for various development and production systems. Mr. Estabrook received his B.S. from University of Massachusetts in the field of Mechanical Engineering and Manufacturing Automation.
